original_title: Destruction ‎– A Savage Symphony: The History of Annihilation
overview: A documentary concert film documenting the German thrash metal band Destruction's complete live set during their appearance at the Wacken Open Air festival in 2007. The second portion of the film details the history of the band from the beginning with exclusive interviews from the band and others.
title: Destruction ‎– A Savage Symphony: The History of Annihilation
